attributes.action: Give Lee Rigby a official memorial.
attributes.additional_details: Link to the story on the local council removing the un-oficial memorial: https://www.rochdaleonline.co.uk/news-features/2/news-headlines/115535/uproar-as-fusilier-lee-rigby-memorial-in-woolwich-removed-by-local-council
attributes.background: Recently in the news, i have seen how the un-official memorial to Lee Rigby was removed by Royal Borough of Greenwich Council, which is a disgrace. Its time we honored this fallen hero with an official memorial that can't be removed.

rejection.details:
Decisions about a memorial in Greenwich would be the responsibility of the local council. 

You can find out how to petition the council here:

http://www.royalgreenwich.gov.uk/info/200033/councillors_democracy_and_elections/1789/petitions_to_the_royal_borough_of_greenwich
